New Records: Morocco scored twice, with goals in the 64th minute and stoppage time
Key Match Events: Morocco scored in the 64th minute and stoppage time
South Africa scored in the 57th minute and stoppage time
Pre-Game Insights: Morocco were tipped as strong contenders, with a 2-0 win over Tanzania and a draw against DR Congo
South Africa had a deflating loss to Mali but a strong win against Namibia
Head-to-head statistics showed South Africa with a slight edge but Morocco won their last meeting at AFCON
Post-Match Reflections: Morocco secured a 2-0 win, moving to the quarter-finals
South Africa's performance was noted despite the loss
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was significant in the tournament context, with the winner progressing to the quarter-finals
Others: The match was part of the Africa Cup of Nations Round of 16
